name: I Love My Dogs
overview: Become a best friend to the animals by taking in abandoned puppies. Look after them every day so they flourish with their new family: feed them, pat them, train them, groom them and play with them. Discover the town around you: take them for walks in the park, enter competitions on the beach and buy new toys and accessories for them at the market. 8 dog breeds: Dalmatian, Husky, Golden Retriever, German Shepherd, Australian Kelpie, Beagle, Border Collie, Brittany Spaniel. 21 activities for playing and training your puppies. Change the way they look with a wide range of accessories.
